mapper.select: SELECT b.backingId, b.amount, b.createdAt, b.backingStatus, py.method, py.cardCompany, s.shippingStatus, s.trackingNum, s.shippedAt, s.deliveredAt, p.title, p.thumbnail, a.addrName, a.recipient, a.postalCode, a.roadAddr, a.detailAddr, a.recipientPhone, c.creatorName, r.rewardId, r.rewardName, r.price, r.deliveryDate, bd.quantity FROM backing b JOIN backingDetail bd ON b.backingId = bd.backingId JOIN reward r ON r.rewardId = bd.rewardId JOIN project p ON p.projectId = r.projectId LEFT JOIN shipping s ON s.backingId = b.backingId LEFT JOIN address a ON a.addrId = s.addrId LEFT JOIN payment py ON py.backingId = b.backingId LEFT JOIN creator c ON c.creatorId = p.creatorId WHERE b.backingId = #{backingId}
SELECT sum(backerCnt) FROM project WHERE creatorId = #{creatorId}

SELECT DISTINCT u.userId, u.nickname,
b.amount, b.createdAt, p.projectId FROM project p JOIN creator c ON p.creatorId = c.creatorId JOIN reward r ON p.projectId = r.projectId JOIN backingDetail bd ON r.rewardId = bd.rewardId JOIN backing b ON bd.backingId = b.backingId JOIN users u ON b.userId = u.userId WHERE c.creatorId = #{creatorId} ORDER BY p.projectId, b.createdAt DESC

SELECT d.target_date AS createdAt, NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT b.backingId), 0) AS count FROM ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1 AS target_date FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.backingId, b.createdAt, p.creatorId FROM backing b JOIN backingDetail bd ON b.backingId = bd.backingId JOIN reward r ON bd.rewardId = r.rewardId JOIN project p ON r.projectId = p.projectId ) b ON TRUNC(b.createdAt) = d.target_date AND b.creatorId = #{creatorId} GROUP BY d.target_date ORDER BY d.target_date

SELECT d.target_month AS createdAt, NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT b.backingId), 0) AS count FROM (
SELECT ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -LEVEL + 1) AS target_month FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12 ) d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.backingId, b.createdAt, p.creatorId FROM backing b JOIN backingDetail bd ON b.backingId = bd.backingId JOIN reward r ON bd.rewardId = r.rewardId JOIN project p ON r.projectId = p.projectId ) b ON TRUNC(b.createdAt, 'MM') = d.target_month AND b.creatorId = #{creatorId} GROUP BY d.target_month ORDER BY d.target_month

SELECT b.backingId, p.projectId, p.title, p.goalAmount, p.currAmount, p.endDate, p.thumbnail, b.userId, b.backingId, b.amount, b.createdAt, b.backingStatus, s.shippingStatus, c.creatorName, r.rewardId, r.rewardName, b.backingId, r.price, r.deliveryDate, bd.quantity FROM backing b JOIN backingDetail bd ON b.backingId = bd.backingId JOIN reward r ON r.rewardId = bd.rewardId JOIN project p ON p.projectId =r.projectId JOIN shipping s ON s.backingId = b.backingId JOIN creator c ON c.creatorId = p.creatorId WHERE b.userId = #{userId} order by createdAt desc
